description: The trap is generated when PPPoE simulation start.
The hwIpDslamPPPoESerialNo indicates Serial Id which is allocated by server
defined in hwIpDslamPPPoETrapsVbOids.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwIpDslamPPPoESmltTrap HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwIpDslamPPPoESerialNo i 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltObjIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltSrvFlowIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltCurrentPhase i 1 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltResult i 3 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltStartTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltEndTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserSessionId u 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltGatewayIp a 192.0.2.1

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwIpDslamPPPoESmltTrap HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwIpDslamPPPoESerialNo i 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltObjIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltSrvFlowIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltCurrentPhase i 1 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltResult i 0 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltStartTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltEndTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserSessionId u 9999 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltGatewayIp a 192.0.2.1

description: It indicates Serial Id which is allocated by server.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwIpDslamPPPoESerialNo

description: Indicates the index of hwPPPoESmltAdminTable.
This leaf means the dialup ID. Currently, only
one user is supported. The maximum value of the
index is 1.
If you specify it to 4294967295, the system will
automatically allocates an idle index.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltObjIndex

description: Indicates the service port ID. Here, it refers to the ID of a service port
that is already created on the current device. The service port ID on the
NMS is larger than the service port ID on the host by 1.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltSrvFlowIndex

description: Indicates the user name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserName

description: Indicates the current stage of the simulation.
Options:
1. discovery(1) -indicates the discovery stage of PPPoE dialup
2. lcp(2) -indicates the LCP negotiation stage. In this stage,
the parameters required for creating, maintaining, and
terminating the PPP networking are negotiated.
3. authentication(3) -indicates the authentication stage. In this stage,
the user is authenticated after the PPPoE connection is
set up.
4. ncp(4) -indicates the NCP negotiation stage. In this stage, the
network-layer compression protocol and IP address are
negotiated.
5. online(5) -indicates the data transmission stage
6. stop(6) -indicates that PPPoE dialup is not performed
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltCurrentPhase

description: Indicates the simulation result.
Options:
1. success(0) -indicates the PPPoE simulation is success
2. otherError(1) -indicates other errors
3. timeout(2) -indicates the PPPoE simulation timeout
4. paramNegoFail(3) -indicates parameter negotiation failure
5. authenticationFail(4) -indicates the simulation authentication is failed
6. peerDownRequest(5) -indicates that the dialup request is denied by the peer end
7. waitPADOTimeout(6) -indicates that sending PADI and waiting for PADO time out
8. waitPADSTimeout(7) -indicates that sending PADR and waiting for PADS time out
9. waitPPPTimeout(8) -indicates waiting for PPP times out, such as an LCP timeout
or an NCP timeout.
10. linkAbnormal(9) -indicates the link of the PPPoE simulation is abnormal
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltResult

description: Indicates the simulation start time.
Data type: DateAndTime.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltStartTime

description: Indicates the simulation end time.
Data type: DateAndTime.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltEndTime

description: Indicates the obtained session ID of the user.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserSessionId

description: Indicates the obtained IP address of the user.
Data type: IpAddress.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltUserIp

description: Indicates the obtained gateway IP address.
Data type: IpAddress.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPDSLAM-PPPOE-MIB::hwPPPoESmltGatewayIp
